name: intronote
label: This is an example *BACKCHECK* file for an introduction to ODK training. The data produced by this file will be used to demonstrate ODK protocols.

name: consent
label: Would you like to proceed with this survey?

name: stamp
label: Please record the date and time of this interview.

name: id
label: Please enter the enumerator ID (number from 1 to 99).
constraint message: You must enter a number from 1 to 99.

name: thanks
label: Thank you, ${name}, for agreeing to participate! Now, I'd like to ask a few questions about you.

name: favfruit
label: What is your ONE favorite kind of fruit from the options presented?

name: favveg
label: What kinds of vegetables do you like to eat?

name: researcharea
label: Which research area(s) do you work in?
hint: We're assuming we're interviewing only research staff. :)

name: endnote
label: Thank you!C2 This is the end of the survey.

name: enumeratorcomment
label: Enumerator, please use this space to save any additional comments about this BACKCHECK interview. Then, please move to the next screen to name and save your survey form.
